mapper.select: select * from eajdbcmonitor where 1=1 and MONITORID= #{MONITORID} and MONITORID= #{MONITORID} and MONITORID= #{MONITORID} and MONITORID= #{MONITORID}
mapper.delete: delete eajdbcmonitor where 1=1 and MONITORID= #{MONITORID} and MONITORID= #{MONITORID} and MONITORID= #{MONITORID} and MONITORID= #{MONITORID}
